contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated with the word "therefore" to show that the woman wisdom laughs at them because they ignored her. Alternate translation: "Therefore I will laugh" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/writing-connectingwords]])

This explains what is meant by "riches and honor." This can be made clear with the connecting statement "therefore." Alternate translation: "therefore, I will give lasting wealth and righteousness to those who find me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/writing-connectingwords]])
